name: Google Voice - Colors Tweak - Grey & Green (Dark)
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Modifications to the toolbar and Plus+ iframe common to other google is in style 55624. Dark Grey & Green color scheme for Google Voice. Everything except for the settings menu has been recolored. The screen shot also shows the style 22380 For matching login screen, check out style 22355 It matches: style 17417 style 23109 style 27060 style 22386 style 17685 2011 08 26 - More minor tweaks 2011 01 03 - Minor tweaks 2010 03 28 - changed that little history expand/collapse button 2010 01 29 - Added style for Contacts menu (Easier to see links)
obsoletion_message: Haven't updated for the new interface. Won't have a chance for a while.
